channel.title: Help me get the full world safe zone except wildy plz

item.title: Help me get the full world safe zone except wildy plz
item.dc:creator: @bloempot99 bloempot99
item.description:
@bloempot99 wrote:

i placed this code in phonescape (pk)

public boolean inwildy = false; public boolean inwildy2 = false; public void checkwildy() { if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3672)) { inwildy = false; } else { inwildy = true; } } public void checkwildy2() { if ((absY <= 10112 && absY >= 3970) || (absY <= 3514)) { inwildy2 = false; } else { inwildy2 = true; } }

but still wildy is safe zone :eek:

could someone help me with making the wildy pk?
i got already everything non pk but wildy is also safe zone know :eek:
i need a code so wildy is pk and the rest of the world not pk

Read full topic
